pages.purpose: Hero landing — introduce MusicJam, its Christian mission, key activities, and guide visitors to merch, donate, and social links

sections.notes: Full-width centred hero with MusicJam logo, tagline 'Play. Worship. Grow.' in Caveat font, warm cream background (#FDF8F4), and primary CTA button ('Support the camp' / 'Поддержать лагерь'). Optional background photo of camp participants with overlay.
Short 2–3 sentence mission statement beneath the hero. Warm, welcoming tone — sets context for teenagers and parents. Language-switched copy in EN/RU/ET.
3-stat strip: 'Since 2018', '5+ cities', '3 languages'. Raspberry accent numbers, muted label text. Thin divider line above and below.

pages.purpose: What is MusicJam — music activities (vocal, instrumental, orchestra, choir, worship band), spiritual focus, small group atmosphere

sections.notes: Section heading ('About MusicJam') + 1–2 paragraphs describing the faith-centred music camp experience. Nunito body text, h2 heading. surfaceAlt background (#F9ECEF) for visual separation.

2×3 icon grid of camp activities: Vocal, Instrumental, Orchestra, Choir, Worship Band, Small Groups. Each card: icon + short title + one-liner. Cards on surfaceAlt (#F9ECEF) with radius-md corners and subtle shadow.

pages.purpose: Timeline of annual camps by city (Tapa 2018–2019, Tapa 2020, Narva 2021, Kohila 2022, Haapsalu 2023)

sections.notes: Section heading + short intro sentence about MusicJam's journey across Estonia since 2018. Centred, h2 in Nunito.

Vertical alternating timeline. Nodes: Tapa 2018, Tapa 2019, Tapa 2020, Narva 2021, Kohila 2022, Haapsalu 2023. Each node: year badge (raspberry), city name (h3), optional photo thumbnail. Timeline line in #B5174A with berry-dot markers.
Section heading ('Merch') + 1 short line encouraging supporters to grab camp gear. Centred.
Horizontal scrollable row of product cards. Each card: product photo, name, price. White surface (#FFFFFF) with radius-md and subtle shadow. Scroll arrows visible on desktop; swipeable on mobile.

pages.purpose: Donation section with PayPal link and funding context

sections.notes: Centred card on surfaceAlt (#F9ECEF) with radius-lg. Contains: heartfelt 1-paragraph message about why donations matter, funding context (scholarships, equipment, venues), and PayPal donate button in accent green (#3EA66B). 'Support the camp' CTA is the primary business goal — make it prominent.
Small print below donate button: non-profit context, how funds are used. caption style text, muted colour (#7A5C68).

Centred row of 3 social icons: Instagram (@musicjam_), YouTube (musicjamcamp), Facebook (musicjamcamp). Icon size ~40px, hover animation (scale + colour tint). Accent green hover state. Sits just above the footer.
Minimal footer: © MusicJam 2018–2026, language switcher pill (ET | RU | EN) via language_switcher component. Background matches surface (#FFFFFF) or primary raspberry for brand close.
